name: leni garfunkel
what_you_do: Leni is an ICF-credentialed coach, certified organizational change management consultant, and leadership and team developer.
who_you_serve: Leni's clients include mature and emerging leaders, teams, partners and individual professionals who are navigating disruption, overwhelm and/or key transitions in their lives and careers.
social_proof: International Coach Federation (ICF) Associate Certified Coach since 2008, Newfield Network Certified Coach since 2007, MS in OD/Behavioral Sciences and Fellow in Change Management from Johns Hopkins University, Contributing author/editor to Neil Rackham's The SPIN© Selling Fieldbook
business_focus: Leni is an ICF-credentialed coach, certified organizational change management consultant, and leadership and team developer, with over 35 years as a business owner and manager.
service_provided: coaching, organizational change management, leadership development, team development
